name: The Phantoms of the Co-Opera
description:
Play your part in this mysterious cooperative puzzle game where you and your companion find yourselves bound to the lost reality of a theatre. Close yet divorced, assist each other from a distance to reveal what lies behind the doors and curtains of memory and love. Is there sincerity in the act of play?

Voice-chat is highly encouraged. Separate computer devices and a stable internet connection required to get the most out of this experience.
